About me

I am a developer working with data intelligence at Brilliant in Trondheim, Norway. Recently I finished my master theisis in Master of Science in Electronic Systems Design within signal processing and communication. In my spare time I’m a tinkerer, playing with home automation and you bet I always have a project going.
